template.description: new JSON array
template.name: array

template.description: Inserts a flow object
template.name: flow

template.description: FTP connection Profile with Basic properties
template.name: jacConnectionProfile:FileTransfer:FTPAll

template.description: FTP connection Profile with Basic properties
template.name: jacConnectionProfile:FileTransfer:FTPBasic

template.description: inserts Defaults object
template.name: jacDefaults

template.description: Inserts a flow object
template.name: jacFlow

template.description: Inserts a folder with all the properties
template.name: jacFolderAll

template.description: Inserts a folder with just the basic property
template.name: jacFolderBasic

template.description: Sub folder object
template.name: jacFolderSubFolder

template.description: Job that copies a blob from one container to another
template.name: jacJobAzureBlobCopyBlob

templates.template:
"AzureBlobCopyBlob": { "Type": "Job:ApplicationIntegrator:Azure blob storage", "ConnectionProfile": "<CONNECTION_PROFILE NAME>",
"AI-Action": "Copy", "AI-Source-uri": "<AZURE SOURCE-URI FOR SOURCE BLOB>", "AI-Destination container": "<AZURE BLOB CONTAINER NAME>", "AI-Destination blob name": "<AZURE BLOB BLOB NAME>" }

template.description: Job that creates a new Azure blob container
template.name: jacJobAzureBlobCreateContainer

templates.template:
"AzureBlobCreateContainer": { "Type": "Job:ApplicationIntegrator:Azure blob storage", "ConnectionProfile": "<CONNECTION_PROFILE NAME>",
"AI-Action": "Create container", "AI-Container (Create/Delete)": "<AZURE BLOB CONTAINER NAME>", "AI-Public Access": "Off" }

template.description: Job that deletes a blob from a container
template.name: jacJobAzureBlobDeleteBlob

templates.template:
"AzureBlobDeleteBlob": { "Type": "Job:ApplicationIntegrator:Azure blob storage", "ConnectionProfile": "<CONNECTION_PROFILE NAME>",
"AI-Action": "Delete", "AI-Container (Delete)": "<AZURE BLOB CONTAINER NAME>", "AI-Blob name (Delete)": "<BLOB_NAME>" }

template.description: Job that deletes a contianer including any blobs inside
template.name: jacJobAzureBlobDeleteContainer

template.description: Job that uploads a file into a azure blob
template.name: jacJobAzureBlobDownload

templates.template:
"AzureBlobDownloadBlob": { "Type": "Job:ApplicationIntegrator:Azure blob storage", "ConnectionProfile": "<CONNECTION_PROFILE NAME>",
"AI-Action": "Download", "AI-Container (Up/Download)": "<AZURE BLOB CONTAINER NAME>", "AI-Blob name (Up/Download)": "<BLOB_NAME>", "AI-File path": "<PATH TO FILE ON AGENT FILE SYSTEM>" }

template.description: List blobs in a container
template.name: jacJobAzureBlobListFiles

templates.template:
"AzureBlobListBlobs": { "Type": "Job:ApplicationIntegrator:Azure blob storage", "ConnectionProfile": "<CONNECTION_PROFILE NAME>",
"AI-Action": "List", "AI-Output": "table", "AI-Container (List)": "<AZURE BLOB CONTAINER NAME>" }

template.description: Job that uploads a file into a azure blob
template.name: jacJobAzureBlobUpload

templates.template:
"AzureBlobUploadBlob": { "Type": "Job:ApplicationIntegrator:Azure blob storage", "ConnectionProfile": "<CONNECTION_PROFILE NAME>",
"AI-Action": "Upload", "AI-Container (Up/Download)": "<AZURE BLOB CONTAINER NAME>", "AI-Blob name (Up/Download)": "<BLOB_NAME>", "AI-File path": "<PATH TO FILE ON AGENT FILE SYSTEM>" }

template.description: A database job that can run SQL Scripts on a (remote) database
template.name: jacJobDatabaseSQLScriptAll

template.description: A database job with only the basic properties to run a SQL script on a (remote) database
template.name: jacJobDatabaseSQLScriptBasic

template.description: Inserts an Embedded Script job
template.name: jacJobEmbeddedScriptJob

template.description: Inserts a file transfer job
template.name: jacJobFileTransferJob

template.description: Watch for a file to be deleted
template.name: jacJobFileWacherJobDelete

template.description: Watch for a file to be created
template.name: jacJobFileWatcherJobCreate

template.description: Inserts a script job
template.name: jacJobScriptJob

template.description: Inserts attributes for Application and sub application
template.name: jacPropertyApplicationSubApplication

template.description: Allows you to define a job or subfolder that requires user confirmation
template.name: jacPropertyConfirm

template.description: Inserts the Control-M Server property
template.name: jacPropertyControlmServer

template.description: Insters the description property
template.name: jacPropertyDescription

template.description: Sets the Order Method attribute
template.name: jacPropertyFolderOrderMethod

template.description: Inserts the Host property to specify the agent where the job will run
template.name: jacPropertyHost

template.description: Inserts a post command to be executed after the job
template.name: jacPropertyJobPostCommand

template.description: Inserts a pre command to be executed before the job
template.name: jacPropertyJobPreCommand

template.description: inserts the run as user
template.name: jacPropertyRunAs

template.description: When objet that defines scheduling based on a combination of date and time constraints
template.name: jacPropertyWhenDateTime

template.name: jacSecret
